1_1KS5GscCymb6yGeHbxx1fmfPtiFEpFX6rv.body: Most of the book I need, I can find with google find by ```filetype:pdf```. If not, find on torrenproject, piratebay, rutracker and rutor. Also recommended resource is vk.com (documents section).
